main.name: Jude Ganihu
main.jobDescription: full stack software engineer across the range of our products, as well being our lead security specialist
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for online security, and a passion for coding. I enjoy being challenged and engaging with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set, as continuing to be up to date with the tech ecosystem is important to me and the success of my career.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: I led the development of V2 portal, moving codebase from html/css to React which improved hacker registration and setup by matching them to mentors and teammates. I have worked extensively with React/Redux as well as with react hooks and redux.

work.title: Android Developer Mentor
work.description: I worked as a mentor and code reviewer to students who were participants of the Android Nanodegree course by Udacity in partnership with Andela. During my role, i learnt as much as i mentored and thought and this helped the students and I grow in both tech skills and soft skills.
